title: Inception
plotDescription: A mind-bending heist thriller directed by Christopher Nolan.

genre.name: Action
genre.description: Action is a film genre in which the protagonist is thrust into a series of events that typically involve violence and physical feats

director.name: Christopher Nolan
director.biography: Christopher Edward Nolan CBE is a British-American filmmaker. Known for his Hollywood blockbusters with complex storytelling, Nolan is considered a leading filmmaker of the 21st century. He has received many accolades and his films have grossed more than $6 billion worldwide.

title: The Dark Knight
plotDescription: A superhero film directed by Christopher Nolan, featuring Batman.

genre.name: Crime
genre.description: A film genre inspired by and analogous to the crime fiction literary genre. Films of this genre generally involve various aspects of crime and its detection.

title: Pulp Fiction
plotDescription: A crime film directed by Quentin Tarantino.

title: Spirited Away
plotDescription: An animated fantasy film directed by Hayao Miyazaki.

genre.name: Animation
genre.description: Animation is a filmmaking technique by which still images are manipulated to create moving images. In traditional animation, images are drawn or painted by hand on transparent celluloid sheets to be photographed and exhibited on film.

director.name: Hayao Miyazaki
director.biography: Legendary Japanese animator and co-founder of Studio Ghibli.

title: Mad Max: Fury Road
plotDescription: Set in a post-apocalyptic desert wasteland where petrol and water are scarce commodities, Fury Road follows Max Rockatansky, who joins forces with Imperator Furiosa against cult leader Immortan Joe and his army, leading to a lengthy road battle.
